TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Debug extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Provides various debugging methods for Android applications, including tracing and allocation counts.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AttachJvmtiAgent (string library, string? options, Java.Lang.ClassLoader? classLoader);
.method public static hidebysig void AttachJvmtiAgent(string library, string options, class Java.Lang.ClassLoader classLoader) cil managed
static member AttachJvmtiAgent : string * string * Java.Lang.ClassLoader -> unit

Docs.param: the library containing the agent.
the options passed to the agent.
the classloader determining the library search path.
Docs.summary: Attach a library as a jvmti agent to the current runtime, with the given classloader determining the library search path.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool DumpService (string? name, Java.IO.FileDescriptor? fd, string[]? args);
.method public static hidebysig bool DumpService(string name, class Java.IO.FileDescriptor fd, string[] args) cil managed

Docs.param: of the service to dump
to write dump output to (usually an output log file)
to pass to the service's dump method, may be null
Docs.summary: Get a debugging dump of a system service by name.
Docs.returns: true if the service was dumped successfully, false if the service could not be found or had an error while dumping

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void StartMethodTracing(string tracePath) cil managed

Docs.param: Path to the trace log file to create. If null, this will default to "dmtrace.trace". If the file already exists, it will be truncated. If the path given does not end in ".trace", it will be appended for you.
Docs.summary: Start method tracing, specifying the trace log file path.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void StartMethodTracing (string? tracePath, int bufferSize);
.method public static hidebysig void StartMethodTracing(string tracePath, int32 bufferSize) cil managed
static member StartMethodTracing : string * int -> unit

Docs.param: Path to the trace log file to create. If null, this will default to "dmtrace.trace". If the file already exists, it will be truncated. If the path given does not end in ".trace", it will be appended for you.
The maximum amount of trace data we gather. If not given, it defaults to 8MB.
Docs.summary: Start method tracing, specifying the trace log file name and the buffer size.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void StartMethodTracing (string? tracePath, int bufferSize, Android.OS.DebugTraceOptions flags);
.method public static hidebysig void StartMethodTracing(string tracePath, int32 bufferSize, valuetype Android.OS.DebugTraceOptions flags) cil managed
static member StartMethodTracing : string * int * Android.OS.DebugTraceOptions -> unit

Docs.param: Path to the trace log file to create. If null, this will default to "dmtrace.trace". If the file already exists, it will be truncated. If the path given does not end in ".trace", it will be appended for you.
The maximum amount of trace data we gather. If not given, it defaults to 8MB.
Flags to control method tracing. The only one that is currently defined is #TRACE_COUNT_ALLOCS.
Docs.summary: Start method tracing, specifying the trace log file name, the buffer size, and flags.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void StartMethodTracingSampling (string? tracePath, int bufferSize, int intervalUs);
.method public static hidebysig void StartMethodTracingSampling(string tracePath, int32 bufferSize, int32 intervalUs) cil managed
static member StartMethodTracingSampling : string * int * int -> unit

Docs.param: Path to the trace log file to create. If null, this will default to "dmtrace.trace". If the file already exists, it will be truncated. If the path given does not end in ".trace", it will be appended for you.
The maximum amount of trace data we gather. If not given, it defaults to 8MB.
The amount of time between each sample in microseconds.
Docs.summary: Start sampling-based method tracing, specifying the trace log file name, the buffer size, and the sampling interval.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
